TRS201.name: Review and Syllabus Overview
TRS201.description: A review of previous transfiguration concepts and an introduction to the course syllabus.

lessons.name: Review of Transfiguration I
lessons.description: Recap of key concepts covered in Transfiguration I, including basic object transformations.

lessons.name: Course Syllabus and Expectations
lessons.description: An overview of the course syllabus, grading policies, and expectations for Transfiguration II.

TRS201.name: Advanced Principles of Transfiguration
TRS201.description: Exploring the theoretical foundations of advanced object transmutation and its practical applications.

lessons.name: Object Transmutation: Theory and Practice
lessons.description: Exploring the theoretical foundations of object transmutation and its practical applications.

lessons.name: Living to Non-living Transfiguration
lessons.description: Transfiguring living creatures into non-living objects, focusing on the complexities and ethical considerations.

DADA441.name: Introduction to Dark Matters
DADA441.description: A broad overview of dark magic, its origins, and the role it plays in wizarding conflicts.

lessons.name: History of Dark Magic
lessons.description: Exploring the origins and evolution of dark magic throughout wizarding history.

lessons.name: Identifying Dark Artifacts
lessons.description: Learning how to recognize dark artifacts and understanding the dangers they pose.

RAV01.name: Understanding Ravenclaw Values
RAV01.description: An exploration of the key values of Ravenclaw house, including wisdom, creativity, and learning.

lessons.name: The Importance of Wisdom
lessons.description: Examining how wisdom is central to Ravenclaw house and how it shapes decisions and actions.

lessons.name: Creativity and Individuality
lessons.description: Understanding the role of creativity and individuality in fostering a Ravenclaw student's academic journey.

RAV01.name: Introduction to Campus Resources
RAV01.description: Familiarizing students with key resources on campus, including academic, health, and social support services.

lessons.name: Academic Support and Libraries
lessons.description: A guide to using the campus libraries and accessing academic support resources available to students.

lessons.name: Health and Wellness Services
lessons.description: An overview of the health and wellness services available to Ravenclaw students on campus.

OWL501.name: Importance of OWLs and Career Planning
OWL501.description: An introduction to the OWL exams and their critical role in shaping future careers in the wizarding world.

lessons.name: Why OWLs Matter
lessons.description: An overview of the significance of OWL exams in academic progression and job prospects.

lessons.name: Career Pathways After OWLs
lessons.description: Exploring various career paths that depend on successful OWL results and how to plan for them.

POT105.name: Review and Syllabus Overview
POT105.description: An introduction to Potion I, reviewing the syllabus and course expectations.

lessons.name: Overview of Potion Brewing Basics
lessons.description: A review of basic potion brewing principles that will be explored throughout the course.

lessons.name: Course Syllabus and Expectations
lessons.description: Detailed review of the Potion I syllabus, including grading policies and expectations for potion practice.

POT106.name: Introduction to the Potion Lab
POT106.description: A comprehensive introduction to the Potion I lab, focusing on lab safety, equipment handling, and experiment procedures.

lessons.name: Lab Introduction
lessons.description: An overview of the lab environment, including the layout and the purpose of key equipment.

lessons.name: Safety and Handling Equipment
lessons.description: A guide to safely handling lab equipment and understanding safety protocols in potion brewing.

lessons.name: Experiment Procedures
lessons.description: An introduction to potion experiment procedures, including proper documentation and steps to follow during lab work.

DADA320.name: Course Overview and Syllabus
DADA320.description: An introduction to the Patronus Theory and Application course, focusing on the syllabus and course expectations.

lessons.name: Course Syllabus and Expectations
lessons.description: A detailed overview of the syllabus, grading policies, and expectations for the Patronus Theory and Application course.

DADA320.name: History of the Patronus Charm
DADA320.description: An exploration of the history and significance of the Patronus charm in defending against dark creatures.

lessons.name: The History of the Patronus Charm
lessons.description: A look into the origin and development of the Patronus charm throughout wizarding history.

lessons.name: The History of the Prisoner of Azkaban and Dementors
lessons.description: An exploration of the history of the Prisoner of Azkaban and the role dementors played in guarding the prison, as well as their relation to the Patronus charm.
